snippet: Bradley Wiggins, the 2012 Tour de France winner and the 2012 Olympic time trial gold medalist, powered to a 44-second victory in the Stage 2 individual time trial and moved into the lead at the Tour of California.
lead_paragraph: Bradley Wiggins, the 2012 Tour de France winner and the 2012 Olympic time trial gold medalist, powered to a 44-second victory in the Stage 2 individual time trial and moved into the lead at the Tour of California.

headline.main: Wiggins Takes Tour of California Lead
